content: The Lurid Lives of Yahoo!'s Readership Search Engines By: Rand Fishkin July 20, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin July 20, 2006 The Lurid Lives of Yahoo!'s Readership Search Engines The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. I came across this banner ad from Yahoo! today and was a bit shocked. I love the raciness and implied issues with the genetalia of older men, but I hope Yahoo! is keeping these highly targeted as I could certainly imagine that it wouldn't play well with much of their demographic. Sadly, I can't find any more banners in this series, but if you know of some, please do share. I'd love to see what else this campaign is doing. UPDATE: Thanks to SherwoodSEO, I was able to grab the second ad - apparently, they've got a Yahoo! as "who-ha" theme going... Copied! Back to Top
